Description: Rectangular glazed composition dish; long sides upright, short sides tapering outwards; mould-made; glaze faded to white but traces of light blue colour preserved; thick yellow core; mended from two piece; small chips at rim.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Enkomi
Bibliographic references: Murray, Smith and Walters 1900 / Excavations in Cyprus (P40, Fig 68)
